1.name: Full load
1.desc: Container represents the full consignment of goods declared on a single Customs declaration (i.e. all goods in the container relate to a single Customs declaration).

2.name: Part load
2.desc: Container represents part of a consignment declared on a single Customs declaration (i.e. the Customs declaration covers more than one container).

3.name: Full load mixed consignments
3.desc: Container holds the full consignment related to the Customs declaration but also holds goods related to other declarations.

4.name: Part load mixed consignments
4.desc: Container represents part of the consignment declared on a single Customs declaration with the remainder being in other containers. Other goods, related to other declarations, are also in the container.

5.name: Single invoiced load
5.desc: Merchandise within a container/package covered by a single invoice.

6.name: Multi invoiced load
6.desc: Merchandise within a container/package covered by more than one invoice.

8.name: Full load, multiple bills
8.desc: A container representing a consignment of goods for one consignee with multiple bill of lading numbers.
